text: Toca asa ahe, jyane tumhala dharativara basavile, tevha jo manusya kupra (inkara) karila tara tyacya kuprace ojhe tyacyavaraca ye'ila ani kaphira lokankarita, tyanca inkara tyancya palanakartyajavala krodha vadhavinyaceca karana tharato ani kaphiransathi tyanca inkara nukasana vadhavinyacica sababa tharato
